languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} from an origin, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, he also gains the basic power of that discipline.

{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

languages.text:
Разные {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилы{/g} относятся к различным дисциплинам, к примеру, пиромантия позволяет создавать и контролировать огонь, чтобы превращать противников в кучки пепла, а биомантия дает возможность управлять биологическими процессами живых существ, чтобы усиливать и исцелять союзников.
Когда нужно выбрать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетипа{/g}, вместо этого псайкер может освоить новую психосилу или дисциплину. Выбирая новую дисциплину, псайкер получает ее базовую силу.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text: Разные {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g} относятся к различным дисциплинам, к примеру, пиромантия позволяет создавать и контролировать огонь, чтобы превращать противников в кучки пепла, а биомантия дает возможность управлять биологическими процессами живых существ, чтобы усиливать и исцелять союзников. Когда нужно выбрать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} от происхождения, вместо этого псайкер может освоить новую психосилу или новую дисциплину. Выбирая новую дисциплину, псайкер получает ее базовую силу.

Разные {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}психосилы{/g} относятся к различным дисциплинам, к примеру, пиромантия позволяет создавать и контролировать огонь, чтобы превращать противников в кучки пепла, а биомантия дает возможность управлять биологическими процессами живых существ, чтобы усиливать и исцелять союзников. Когда нужно выбрать {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талант{/g} от происхождения, вместо этого псайкер может освоить новую психосилу или новую дисциплину. Выбирая новую дисциплину, псайкер получает ее базовую силу.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psionische Kräfte{/g} sind in verschiedene Disziplinen unterteilt – zum Beispiel ermöglicht die Pyromantie dem Psioniker, Feuer zu kontrollieren und zu erschaffen und Gegner zu Asche zu {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}verbrennen{/g}. Die Biomantie ermöglicht dem Psioniker, biologische Prozesse in Lebewesen zu kontrollieren und seine Verbündeten zu stärken und zu heilen. Wenn der Psioniker eine neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} aus einem {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g} auswählt, kann er stattdessen eine neue psionische Kraft oder Disziplin wählen. Wenn der Psioniker eine neue Disziplin wählt, erhält er auch die Grundfähigkeit dieser Disziplin.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}Psionische Kräfte{/g} sind in verschiedene Disziplinen unterteilt — zum Beispiel ermöglicht die Pyromantie dem Psioniker, Feuer zu kontrollieren und zu erschaffen und Gegner zu Asche zu {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}verbrennen{/g}. Die Biomantie ermöglicht es dem Psioniker, biologische Prozesse in Lebewesen zu kontrollieren und seine Verbündeten zu stärken und zu heilen.
Wenn der Psioniker eine neue {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder ein neues {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} von einem Ursprung auswählt, kann er stattdessen eine neue psionische Kraft oder Disziplin wählen. Wenn der Psioniker eine neue Disziplin wählt, erhält er auch die Grundfähigkeit dieser Disziplin.

languages.text: Le maniement des {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} se décompose en différentes disciplines, dont la pyromancie qui permet à un psyker d'allumer et de contrôler des feux afin de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}réduire{/g} ses adversaires en cendres, ou la biomancie, qui permet au psyker de contrôler les processus biologiques à l'intérieur des organismes vivants afin de renforcer et de soigner ses alliés. Lorsqu'il en a la possibilité, plutôt que de sélectionner une nouvelle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} au sein d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g}, le psyker peut choisir un nouveau pouvoir psychique ou une nouvelle discipline. S'il choisit une nouvelle discipline, il bénéficie également du pouvoir de base correspondant.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
Le maniement des {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}pouvoirs psychiques{/g} se décompose en différentes disciplines, comme la pyromancie qui permet à un psyker d'allumer et de contrôler des feux afin de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}réduire{/g} ses adversaires en cendres, ou la biomancie, qui permet au psyker de contrôler les processus biologiques à l'intérieur de l'organisme des créatures vivantes afin de renforcer et de soigner ses alliés.
Lorsqu'il en a la possibilité, plutôt que de sélectionner une nouvelle {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou un nouveau {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} au sein d'une origine, le psyker peut choisir un nouveau pouvoir psychique ou une nouvelle discipline. S'il choisit une nouvelle discipline, il bénéficie également du pouvoir de base de celle-ci.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}分为多个不同的派系。例如，炎术大师可以凭空召唤烈焰，操纵烈焰，将敌人化为灰烬，而生物系灵能者可以操纵目标体内的生物过程，治疗盟友，让他们在战斗中更加强大。
当灵能者可以解锁{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}的新{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或新天赋时，该灵能者可以选择不解锁能力或天赋，而是学习新的灵能能力，或研究新的能派系。当灵能者研究新的派系时，也会掌握该派系的基本灵能能力。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}灵能力量{/g}分为多个不同的派系。例如，炎术大师可以凭空召唤烈焰，操纵烈焰，将敌人化为灰烬，而生物系灵能者可以操纵目标体内的生物过程，治疗盟友，让他们在战斗中更加强大。{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}{/g}
当灵能者可以解锁的新{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或新{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}时，该灵能者可以选择不解锁能力或天赋，而是学习新的灵能能力，或研究新的能派系。当灵能者研究新的派系时，也会掌握该派系的基本灵能力量。

languages.text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} están divididos en varias disciplinas. Por ejemplo, la piromancia permite al psíquico controlar y crear fuego, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemando{/g} a sus oponentes hasta reducirlos a cenizas, mientras que la biomancia le permite controlar los procesos biológicos de los seres vivos, reforzando y curando a sus aliados.
Cuando un psíquico elige una nueva {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g}, en vez de eso puede elegir un nuevo poder psíquico u otra disciplina. Cuando un psíquico aprende una nueva disciplina, también gana el poder básico correspondiente.
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
Los {g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}poderes psíquicos{/g} están divididos en varias disciplinas. Por ejemplo, la piromancia permite al psíquico controlar y crear fuego, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemando{/g} a sus oponentes hasta reducirlos a cenizas, mientras que la biomancia le permite controlar los procesos biológicos de los seres vivos, reforzando y curando a sus aliados.
Cuando un psíquico elige una nueva {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} de un origen, en vez de eso puede elegir un nuevo poder psíquico u otra disciplina. Cuando un psíquico aprende una nueva disciplina, también gana el poder básico correspondiente.

languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic Powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, burning opponents into ashes, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies. When the psyker selects a new ability or a talent from an origin, the psyker can instead select a new Psychic Power or a new discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, he also gains the basic power of that discipline.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}にはさまざまな規律がある。例えば、パイロマンシーにより異能者は火を操ったり作ったりして、敵を{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}焼き尽くし{/g}て灰にすることができる。その一方で生体秘法は、異能者が生体内の生物的過程を操り、異能者の味方に力を与え、癒やすことを可能にする。
異能者が発生源から新たな{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}を選ぶと、その異能者は新たな超能力または規律を、代わりに選択することができる。異能者が新たな規律を手に入れると、その規律の基礎となるパワーも獲得する。
languages.original_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsychicPowers}超能力{/g}にはさまざまな規律がある。例えば、パイロマンシーにより異能者は火を操ったり作ったりして、敵を{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}させて灰にすることができる。その一方で生体秘法は、異能者が生体内の生物的過程を操り、異能者の味方に力を与え、癒やすことを可能にする。
異能者が発生源から新たな{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を選ぶと、その異能者は新たな超能力または規律を、代わりに選択することができる。異能者が新たな規律を手に入れると、その規律の基礎となるパワーも獲得する。

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Ruhsezi güçleri{/g} birkaç disipline ayrılır. Örneğin ateşbazlık, ruhsezerin ateş yaratıp ona hükmetmesine, düşmanları {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yakıp{/g} küle çevirmesine olanak tanırken; biyobüyü ise ruhsezerin canlıların içindeki biyolojik süreçlere hükmedebilmesini, dost birimlerini güçlendirip iyileştirebilmesini sağlar.
Bir {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipten{/g} yeni bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} seçme zamanı geldiğinde, ruhsezer bunun yerine yeni bir ruhsezi gücü veya disiplin seçebilir. Ruhsezer yeni bir disiplin öğrendiğinde, o disiplinin temel gücünü de kazanır.

{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}Psychic powers{/g} are divided into several disciplines — for example, pyromancy allows the psyker to control and create fire, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} opponents to ash, and biomancy allows the psyker to control biological processes inside living creatures, empowering and healing the psyker's allies.
When the psyker selects a new {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} from an {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g}, the psyker can instead select a new psychic power or discipline. When the psyker takes a new discipline, they also gain the basic power of that discipline.
